name: Steal'em All
description:
Stealth\Comedy VR thief simulation. You are a student/thief and it is time to pay your student loans...Steal EM ALL them paintings.

This game was designed on Oculus Rift(consumer version)

You will need an Xbox pad to play it and SOUND !!!

Let me know about problems/feeback at @panoslennon

*This version was done during 2 days for the VRJAM16 AND LudumDare 35
